about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn more about Delta and our journey.
about.missionText: We aim to build scalable, maintainable systems that empower developers at Delta.
about.visionText: To be a trusted platform for clean architecture and collaboration.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This page explains how we handle your data.
privacy.dataText: We only collect the information necessary to provide our services.
privacy.securityText: We use modern security practices to protect your information.

supportPage.title: Technical Support
supportPage.intro: Need help? Our support team is here to assist you.
supportPage.faqText: Check our FAQ section for quick answers.
supportPage.contactText: If you need further assistance, please reach out to our support team.

homeClient.title: Upload your files or folder
homeClient.description: Choose the files or folder to back up and a report will be generated instantly with a copy uploaded to GitHub.

cta.title: Ready to start your journey with Delta?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of developers who trust Delta to manage their projects and backups.

features.headline: Integrated solutions for your needs
features.description: We provide a comprehensive set of powerful tools to manage your projects efficiently and professionally.

security.title: Global Security
security.description: Advanced data protection with the latest encryption technologies and two-factor authentication support.

reports.title: Interactive Reports
reports.description: A complete dashboard with live charts, customizable reports, and multi-format export.

performance.title: High Performance
performance.description: Fast data processing with ultra-low response time even under heavy loads.

multilang.title: Multi-language
multilang.description: A multilingual user interface with full support for Arabic and English.

github.title: GitHub Integration
github.description: Direct sync with GitHub repositories and instant backup updates.

scalability.title: Scalability
scalability.description: Clean, extensible architecture with comprehensive documentation and clear APIs.

hero.headline: The Backup Platform
hero.description: A complete solution for backup management, data analysis, and interactive reporting with top security and performance standards.

testimonials.headline: What our clients say
testimonials.description: Join thousands of professionals who trust Delta to manage their projects

items.name: Ahmed Mohamed
items.content: Since I started using Delta, I‚Äôve saved countless hours of hard work. The integrated tools and ease of use make it the perfect solution for tech teams.

items.name: Sara Al-Khalid
items.content: The intuitive dashboard and detailed reports helped me track my projects much better. Highly recommended for all developers.

items.name: Khaled Al-Otaibi
items.content: The best thing about Delta is reliability and security. I feel completely at ease knowing my data is safe and protected.

items.name: Noura Al-Fuhaid
items.content: Integration with design tools is extremely easy. It saved me a lot of time transferring designs into code.
